Properties.ProtectedString:
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") AnimPlaying = Tool:WaitForChild("AnimPlaying") AnimReloading = Tool:WaitForChild("AnimReloading") PlaySound = Handle:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris") Players = game:GetService("Players")
Animating = false MouseDown = false
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Animating = false
function OnEquipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
AnimPlayingConnection = AnimPlaying.Changed:connect(function() if AnimPlaying.Value then Animating = true ArmsUpTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ArmsUp) ArmsUpTrack:Play() else if ArmsUpTrack then ArmsUpTrack:Stop() end Animating = false end end)
Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if not Animating then MouseDown = true Charge_Animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ChargeAnim) Charge_Animation:Play() while MouseDown do wait() end if Charge_Animation then Charge_Animation:Stop() end local vDirection = (Torso.Position - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p).unit local mDirection = (Humanoid.TargetPoint - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p).unit
PlaySound.Value = "62337944"
local AngleBetweenVectors = math.abs(math.acos(vDirection:Dot(mDirection))) if AngleBetweenVectors < 0.5 then Slash_Animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlashAnim) Slash_Animation:Play() else Stab_Animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.StabAnim) Stab_Animation:Play() end end end)
Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseDown = false if not Animating then Tool.Enabled = false Animating = true wait(1.5) Tool.Enabled = true Animating = false end end)
Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "q" and not AnimReloading.Value then AnimPlaying.Value = true end end) end
function OnUnequipped() if Charge_Animation then Charge_Animation:Stop() end if Slash_Animation then Slash_Animation:Stop() end if Stab_Animation then Stab_Animation:Stop() end if ArmsUpTrack then ArmsUpTrack:Stop() end if AnimPlayingConnection and AnimPlayingConnection.connected then AnimPlayingConnection:disconnect() end Animating = false MouseDown = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Handle:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
PlaySound.Changed:connect(function() if PlaySound.Value ~= "" then local SoundId = PlaySound.Value PlaySound.Value = "" local Sound = Instance.new("Sound") Sound.Looped = false Sound.Pitch = 1 Sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. SoundId Sound.PlayOnRemove = false Sound.Volume = 0.5 Debris:AddItem(Sound, 3) Sound.Parent = Handle wait() Sound:Play() end end)

Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") AnimPlaying = Tool:WaitForChild("AnimPlaying") AnimReloading = Tool:WaitForChild("AnimReloading")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
SpecialReloadTime = 15
Damage = 10
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_Tag.Value = player creator_Tag.Name = "creator" creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Blow(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local humanoid = Hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid then
local right_arm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if right_arm then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint and (joint.Part0 == Handle or joint.Part1 == Handle)) then TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) wait(1) UntagHumanoid(humanoid) end end
end end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Character or not Player or not Humanoid then return end AnimPlayingConnection = AnimPlaying.Changed:connect(function() if AnimPlaying.Value then local OriginalWalkSpeed = Humanoid.WalkSpeed Humanoid.WalkSpeed = OriginalWalkSpeed AnimPlaying.Value = true AnimReloading.Value = true wait(1) local TorsoCFrame = Torso.CFrame local Snake = Instance.new("Part") Snake.Name = "Snake" Snake.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic Snake.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Snake.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Snake.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Snake.Size = Vector3.new(3.5, 0.75, 0.2) Snake.CanCollide = true Snake.Friction = 0 local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=49046138" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=49046409" Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.75, 0.75) Mesh.Parent = Snake Snake.CFrame = TorsoCFrame + TorsoCFrame.lookVector * ((Torso.Size.z / 2) + (Snake.Size.x / 2)) Snake.CFrame = Snake.CFrame - Vector3.new(0, (Torso.Size.y * 1.5), 0) for i = 1, 5 do for i = 1, 3 do local SnakeClone = Snake:Clone() local SnakeCloneY = SnakeClone:Clone() SnakeCloneY.CFrame = SnakeCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) SnakeCloneY.CFrame = SnakeCloneY.CFrame + SnakeCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * ((SnakeCloneY.Size.y / 2)) local SnakeCloneZ = SnakeCloneY:Clone() SnakeCloneZ.CFrame = SnakeCloneZ.CFrame local SnakeCloneX = SnakeCloneZ:Clone() SnakeCloneX.CFrame = SnakeCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) SnakeCloneX.CFrame = SnakeCloneX.CFrame - SnakeCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * ((Torso.Size.x / 2) + (Snake.Size.y / 2)) SnakeCloneX.CFrame = SnakeCloneX.CFrame + SnakeCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * ((Snake.Size.y / 2) + (i * Snake.Size.y)) local snake = Snake:Clone() local BrickColor = BrickColor.new(math.random(), math.random(), math.random()) local R, G, B = BrickColor.r, BrickColor.g, BrickColor.b snake.Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(R, G, B) local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(400000, 400000, 400000) BodyGyro.Parent = snake local Force = Instance.new("BodyForce") Force.Parent = snake Debris:AddItem(snake, 5) snake.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") snake.CFrame = SnakeCloneX.CFrame snake.CFrame = snake.CFrame * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), (math.pi / 2), math.pi) BodyGyro.cframe = snake.CFrame Force.force = TorsoCFrame.lookVector * (Snake:GetMass() * 9.81 * 5) snake.Velocity = TorsoCFrame.lookVector * 50 snake.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Hit.Parent ~= Character and Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local humanoid = Hit.Parent.Humanoid humanoid:TakeDamage(15) end end) end wait(0.125) end AnimReloading.Value = true AnimPlaying.Value = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = OriginalWalkSpeed wait(SpecialReloadTime) AnimReloading.Value = false end end) end
function Unequipped() if AnimPlayingConnection and AnimPlayingConnection.connected then AnimPlayingConnection:disconnect() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
connection = Handle.Touched:connect(Blow)
